title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: stitched-resist with indigo dye
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Long cloth for woman's garment, with a large-scale design in white on blue of two rows of squares criss-crossed by diagonal lines. The triangles thus formed are dotted with small circles.
